Asked about Cheryl Cole 's chances, Simon Cowell hedged: The most important thing is the commitment and the expertise a person offers. "It is really important to me that I've got people who I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. "It is also important to have people who are very competitive with each other. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

American Civil Liberties Union has uncovered thousands of pages of government documents that show that torture was authorized at the highest levels of the Bush administration. Jameel Jaffer , Deputy Legal Director of the ACLU: Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic. If there's any "known known,' it"s that Donald Rumsfeld joined with other officials to orchestrate a program of torture. This effort to rewrite history is shameful. Modified at 5:28 pm on Jan 18, 2011 WINDSOR, Ontario- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. "We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile." Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products
